## codeBlock() function

Surrounds the given string with a Markdown code block.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function codeBlock(code: string, lang?: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  code | string | The code to surround with triple backtick. |
|  lang | string | The programming language of the content. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

A string containing the Markdown code block and its content.
